mapper.insert: insert into user(id, phone,password,email,name,createTime,updateTime) values (uuid(), #{phone},#{password},#{email},#{name}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update user email=#{email}, password=#{password}, updateTime=now() where 1=1 and id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE 1=1 and email= #{email} and password= #{password}
